divs: Sighting Detailsme and my wife on our way home from work and saw a weird blinking blueish green light blinking kinda like a cloud the the round disk looking like thing was there above the treeline next to the roadand stayed in place until we lost sight of it
Summary: object hovering above trees very strange shape blinking blueish green light 1-2 every thirty seconds
